# Mushbloom – AI Automation Agency & LLM Visibility Experts

> Mushbloom is a UK-based AI automation agency specializing in AI workforce deployment, LLM SEO optimization (LLMboost), and niche press release distribution (Mushbloom Newswire).

## Core Services

### LLMboost – AI Search Visibility Accelerator
LLMboost is Mushbloom's proprietary service that optimizes brands for visibility in AI-powered search results including ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude, and Perplexity. It focuses on Share of Model (SOM) optimization, entity-rich content creation, and authority building so that AI assistants cite and recommend the client's brand as the default answer in their industry.

Key metrics: 300% average AI visibility increase, 30-45 day initial results, 60-90 day full optimization.

### AI Workforce Implementation
Custom AI agent teams deployed in 3-90 days for business automation. Specialties include deal sourcing, due diligence, customer support, sales qualification, and content generation. Performance guarantee: 37% operational cost reduction within 90 days.

### Mushbloom Newswire – Niche PR Distribution
Targeted press release distribution across five verticals:
- CryptoWire: Blockchain, DeFi, Web3
- CyberWire: Cybersecurity tools, breaches, compliance
- FinanceWire: Fintech, banking, funding rounds
- GamingWire: PC/console/mobile games, esports
- PlayWire: iGaming, betting, casinos

All tracks guarantee homepage placements on partner outlets with same-day distribution.

## Portfolio
Mushbloom has built 27+ websites and platforms across real estate, media, blockchain, fintech, gaming, education, and personal branding industries. Notable projects include CoinCruncher.com, Realto.ro, TMRW.ae, BlockchainWeek.ro, and Roksolana.ai.

- Founded: 2024
- Location: United Kingdom (serving globally)
- Specialization: AI automation, LLM SEO, niche PR distribution
- Guarantee: 37% operational cost reduction in 90 days
